<math display="block">\binom{n}{k}=\binom{n}{n-k}</math>

== Proof idea ==
for each choice of <math display="inline">k</math> elements, we can make a bijection to a choice of the other <math display="inline">n-k</math> elements not chosen therefore they count the same thing.
